00008 class SDLThread:
00009      def __init__(self,screen):
00010           self.m_bKeepGoing=self.m_bRunning=False
00011           self.screen=screen
00012           self.color=(255,0,0)
00013           self.rect=(10,10,100,100)
00014 
00015      def Start(self):
00016           self.m_bKeepGoing = self.m_bRunning = True
00017           thread.start_new_thread(self.Run, ())
00018 
00019      def Stop(self):
00020           self.m_bKeepGoing = False
00021 
00022      def IsRunning(self):
00023           return self.m_bRunning
00024 
00025      def Run(self):
00026         while self.m_bKeepGoing:
00027              e=pyGame.event.poll()
00028              if e.type==pyGame.MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00029                   self.color=(255,0,128)
00030                   self.rect=(e.pos[0],e.pos[1],100,100)
00031                   print e.pos
00032              self.screen.fill((0,0,0))
00033              self.screen.fill(self.color,self.rect)
00034              pyGame.display.flip()
00035         self.m_bRunning=False;

00037 class SDLPanel(wx.Panel):
00038     def __init__(self,parent,ID,tplSize):
00039         global pyGame
00040         wx.Panel.__init__(self,parent,ID,size=tplSize)
